properties.areaDesc: S of Oregon Inlet NC to Cape Hatteras NC out to 20 nm; S of Cape Hatteras NC to Ocracoke Inlet NC out to 20 nm
properties.headline: Gale Warning issued January 7 at 1:22PM EST until January 8 at 2:00AM EST by NWS Newport/Morehead City NC
properties.description:
...QUICK MOVING COLD FRONT TO BRING GALES TO COASTAL WATERS THIS
AFTERNOON AND TONIGHT...

.Strong southwest winds will continue into the evening ahead of a
cold front with speeds of 25 to 35 knots expected. Winds will
shift to the west- northwest behind the front this evening. Seas
will build to as high as 6 to 9 feet this evening. Conditions
gradually improve Wednesday.

* WHAT...Southwest winds 25 to 35 kt with gusts up to 40 kt,
becoming west this evening, and seas 6 to 9 feet expected.

* WHERE...The coastal waters from Oregon Inlet to Ocracoke Inlet.

* WHEN...Until 2 AM EST Wednesday.

* IMPACTS...Strong winds will cause hazardous seas which could
capsize or damage vessels and reduce visibility.
properties.instruction:
Mariners should alter plans to avoid these hazardous conditions.
Remain in port, seek safe harbor, alter course, and/or secure the
vessel for severe conditions.

NWSheadline: GALE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 2 AM EST WEDNESDAY
